summary: SkyVerge reported $87.2 billion in annual revenue, driven by significant growth in its EdgeAI and cloud infrastructure offerings. The company achieved a net income of $15.4 billion, maintaining a healthy profit margin of 22%. With a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.74, SkyVerge remains financially stable while continuing to invest in AI innovation. The company now serves over 60% of the global top 200 enterprises and marks 17 years of operations in the cloud intelligence sector.
